footer: pramit bangla - It is the urban dialect spoken in majority by the people of cities and towns in West Bengal. This can be loosely considered as a spoken version of the informal language used in print. In Bangladesh, it is mostly used in very formal settings, in education and in media.

linguistic/geographical background - Bangla is spoken widely across India and Bangladesh. But each geographical locale has its specific features and characteristics of speech in Bangla. When we hear someone speak in Bangla, these speech characteristics help us identify where the person is from.
